external_games.name: Youtooz Presents: Five Nights at Freddy's

name: Youtooz Presents: Five Nights at Freddy's
storyline: As a Youtooz employee, the player is tasked with housing the newest line of Youtooz collectibles. However, these collectibles have been upgraded to the point of being miniature animatronics, and will try to escape their boxes to attack the player.
summary: Youtooz Presents: Five Nights at Freddy's is an augmented reality mobile game developed by Youtooz. It was released to coincide with the release of Youtooz's Security Breach wave figures.
